name: joy-of-routing
description: A demonstration project for Cerebral routing to accompany a blog post

scripts.start: cross-env kotatsu serve app/main.js --index app/index.html --config webpack.config.js --devtool eval-source-map
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production kotatsu build client app/main.js --config webpack.production.config.js --minify -o dist

author: Colin Fallon <colinf@mac.com> (http://colinfallon.com)
